level.heading: Jurors fees.
level.text: ยง 7-401 Jurors fees. In pursuance of section five hundred twenty-one of the judiciary law, it is hereby directed that the sum of twelve dollars be allowed to each grand juror and each trial juror for each day's necessary attendance as such a juror at a term of any court of record of civil or criminal jurisdiction held within the city of New York; provided, however, that no such juror shall be so paid for attendance on any day on which the juror shall be excused from service at his or her own request.
